artefact.overview: You need a licence to provide betting facilities at a track or sports stadium in Northern Ireland
artefact.licence_short_description: Licence to provide betting facilities at a track or sports stadium in Northern Ireland from the Department of Social Development.
artefact.licence_overview: To provide betting facilities at a track or sports stadium in Northern Ireland, you need a licence from the [Department of Social Development.](http://www.dsdni.gov.uk/ "Department of Social Development"){:rel="external"}
